entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
